title: How to get around the 40-minute zoom limit - Quora

response.answer_text: Two ways. First you pay the few for professional users which runs around 195.00 and allows for larger meetings of longer duration. If that is too expensive, you simply schedule backbti back 40 minute meetings and when one ends, everyone takes a 2 minute break and logs into the next meeting.

Option 1 (Free): If one of the participants has a membership they should organise the meeting. Option 2 (Free, not as convenient): Do 2 or more back to back meetings, everyone has to rejoin each time Option 3 (most convenient): support the business for a reasonable fee for the service you are using and enjoy not having a time limit for your meetings.
